    @allure.title("Нажатие кнопки добавления в корзину несколько раз")
    def test_double_click_add(browser, base_url):
        NUMBER_OF_CLICKS = 3

        mp_actions.go_to_mainpage(base_url)
        add_to_cart = mp_actions.find_all_specified_elements(mp_actions.ADD_TO_CART)

            add_to_cart[0].click()
        raw_price = mp_actions.find_web_element(mp_actions.PRODUCT_PRICE).text

        num_price = float(price[1::])
        calculated_total_price = "$" + str(NUMBER_OF_CLICKS * num_price)
